intro.title: What is Copy Trading?
intro.description: Copying means allocating capital to a professional trader's management. The trader operates on Exness using their verified strategy, and you receive signals to manually replicate their trades in your own account.
intro.important: Start by defining your risk profile and total amount; then diversify across multiple strategies to reduce concentrated exposure. This is not 'easy money' — it's education + discipline.
intro.warning_text: Define your total amount and risk profile before choosing strategies. Diversify by symbols and styles to reduce correlation.

evaluation.title: How to evaluate a strategy by numbers
evaluation.subtitle: PF and DD are not promises, they are historical. Use exposure limits at portfolio level.

gating.title: Affiliation Status
gating.blocked_message: To follow strategies on Exness, you need to validate your affiliation.

disclaimers.risk: Trading involves significant risk of loss. Past performance does not guarantee future results.
disclaimers.educational: This content is educational. It does not constitute financial advice or investment recommendation.
disclaimers.affiliation: Access to copy trading requires an affiliated and verified account.
